title: [Hallway]
description: A mismatched pair of rogues stand to one side discussing various aspects of guild training.  One of them, a stocky dwarf with an impressive beard, busies herself at cleaning a filthy window without seeming to make much progress, while the other, a tall sylvan who appears to be favoring one foot, seems content to lean against the wall.

A mismatched pair of rogues, outlined in the dim moonlight forcing its way through a dirty window, stand to one side discussing various aspects of guild training.  One of them, a stocky dwarf with an impressive beard, busies herself at cleaning the filthy window without seeming to make much progress, while the other, a tall sylvan who appears to be favoring one foot, seems content to lean against the wall.
